dcterms:creator: Quoc V. Le
Navdeep Jaitly
Geoffrey E. Hinton
dcterms:description: A standard benchmark task that requires continuous updates of short-term memory over a long timespan, where the task is to classify the handwritten digits of the MNIST dataset when the pixels are presented sequentially.
dcterms:title: Sequential MNIST

dcterms:creator: Klaus Greff
Rupesh K. Srivastava
Jan Koutník
Bas R. Steunebrink
Jürgen Schmidhuber
dcterms:description: A real-world speech recognition task where the LSNN has to classify each audio frame to one of the 61 phoneme classes, using preprocessed audio into Mel Frequency Cepstral Coefficients (MFCCs).
dcterms:title: TIMIT
